thread.title: An NSYNC Reunion with All Five Members Is Happening This Year
thread.title_full: An NSYNC Reunion with All Five Members Is Happening This Year

author: Kelsey Glein
title: An NSYNC Reunion with All Five Members Is Happening This Year
text:
› An *NSYNC Reunion with All Five Members Is Happening This Year An *NSYNC Reunion with All Five Members Is Happening This Year Getty by: Kelsey Glein 
If all you ever wanted was an *NSYNC reunion, you're in luck—the popular boyband has plans to reunite this year, and it will make all of your teenage dreams come true. "We're doing something special. I don't know if I can announce it yet," Lance Bass teased in a recent interview with ET before spilling the exciting news for fans. "We're coming out with a really cool vinyl edition of our Christmas album." Bass then revealed that all five members of *NSYNC— Justin Timberlake , JC Chasez, Chris Kirkpatrick, Joey Fatone , and himself—will come together at some point this year to get their star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. "We'll all be there!" he said. "We just have to decide on a date. We're terrible at planning things. We're five guys, so for us to make a decision about anything is really hard, so we just need to do it. So hopefully maybe around Christmas time. It'll be fun to see everybody again." 
VIDEO: Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel's Cutest Couple Moments 
Dying for new music from the band? You can say "Bye Bye Bye" to that hope—the re-release of Home for Christmas will only feature old songs. But don't assume it's because they don't stay in touch. Bass also shared that they're constantly group texting. "We talk daily," he added. "All five of us."
